snippet: Ricky Rubio, who has not played since March because of an injury, gave Minnesota a much-needed lift in an overtime win over Dallas.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Minnesota Timberwolves beat Dallas Mavericks, 114-106, in overtime; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Ricky Rubio, who has not played since March because of an injury, gave Minnesota a much-needed lift in an overtime win over Dallas.

headline.seo: Return of Ricky Rubio Gives Timberwolves a Boost Over Mavericks
headline.main: Return of Rubio Gives Timberwolves a Boost
headline.print_headline: Return of Rubio Gives Timberwolves a Boost
